title: Life Changing and Inspiring Quotes of Swami Vivekanand
description: Swami Vivekanand (1863-1902), a great Indian sage, spiritual genius, lighthouse of wisdom, unparalleled thinker and philosopher, is the role model of billions of human beings all over the world. This book is a humble effort to compile the life changing and inspiring quotes of Swami Vivekanand. These quotes of this great sage and reformer will help you to recharge your life with positivity.Read this book-get inspired-live life with a new vision.
author: Pradeep Chaswal
